# FileTemplateAssociation

Captures an association between a file template and another resource in the system. This can be used to find whether a template is somehow relevant. 

## Properties
Name | Type | Description | Notes
------------ | ------------- | ------------- | -------------
**object_id** | **str** | Unique identifier | 
**object_type** | [**ObjectType**](ObjectType.md) |  | 
**descriptive_text** | **str** | Optionally used by a client to distinguish between per-object uses of the template. | [optional] 
**any string name** | **bool, date, datetime, dict, float, int, list, str, none_type** | any string name can be used but the value must be the correct type | [optional]
